mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM sftc_order o, sftc_order_express oe WHERE o.id = oe.order_id AND o.region_type = 'REGION_NATION' AND o.is_cancel = 0 AND oe.reserve_time IS NOT NULL AND oe.reserve_time != '' AND oe.state = 'WAIT_HAND_OVER'

SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM sftc_order o, sftc_order_express oe WHERE o.id = oe.order_id AND o.region_type = 'REGION_NATION' AND o.is_cancel = 0 AND (oe.state = 'WAIT_FILL' OR oe.state = 'ALREADY_FILL' OR oe.state = 'PAYING') AND receive_time IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM sftc_order o, sftc_order_express oe WHERE o.id = oe.order_id AND o.is_cancel = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(order_id) FROM sftc_order_express WHERE order_id = o.id) > 1 AND region_type IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM sftc_order o, sftc_order_express oe WHERE o.id = oe.order_id AND (1 = (SELECT COUNT(order_id) FROM sftc_order_express WHERE order_id = o.id)) AND o.is_cancel = 0 AND ( (oe.state = 'WAIT_FILL' OR oe.state = 'ALREADY_FILL') OR (o.region_type = 'REGION_SAME' AND oe.state = 'PAYING') )
SELECT * FROM sftc_order WHERE id = #{order_id} FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sftc_order (freight, create_time, sender_province, sender_name, sender_mobile, sender_city, sender_area, sender_addr, word_message, image, voice, sender_user_id, gift_card_id, pay_method, distribution_method, longitude, latitude, order_type, voice_time, region_type) VALUES ( #{freight, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{create_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_area, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{word_message, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gift_card_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pay_method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distribution_method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{order_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voice_time, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{region_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )

INSERT INTO sftc_order (freight, create_time, sender_province, sender_name, sender_mobile, sender_city, sender_area, sender_addr, supplementary_info, word_message, image, voice, sender_user_id, gift_card_id, pay_method, distribution_method, longitude, latitude, order_type, voice_time, region_type) VALUES ( #{freight, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{create_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_area, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplementary_info, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{word_message, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender_user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gift_card_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pay_method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distribution_method, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{order_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{voice_time, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{region_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=String} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sftc_order o WHERE id IN ( SELECT t.order_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT oe.order_id FROM sftc_order_express oe WHERE (oe.sender_user_id = #{id} OR oe.ship_user_id = #{id}) ) AS t ) AND order_type = 'ORDER_MYSTERY' ORDER BY o.create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}

select sftc_order_express.id, sftc_order_express.order_number, sftc_order.pay_time, sftc_order.pay_method, sftc_order.distribution_method, sftc_order.freight, sftc_order.sender_name, sftc_order.sender_mobile, sftc_order.sender_province, sftc_order.sender_city, sftc_order.sender_area, sftc_order.sender_addr, sftc_order.word_message, sftc_order.image, sftc_order.voice, sftc_order.longitude, sftc_order.latitude, sftc_order.sender_user_id, sftc_order.gift_card_id, sftc_order_express.ship_name, sftc_order_express.ship_mobile, sftc_order_express.ship_province, sftc_order_express.ship_city, sftc_order_express.ship_area, sftc_order_express.ship_addr, sftc_order_express.package_type, sftc_order_express.object_type, sftc_order_express.state, sftc_order_express.is_use, sftc_order_express.sender_user_id, sftc_order_express.order_id, sftc_order_express.ship_user_id from sftc_order, sftc_order_express where (sftc_order_express.sender_user_id=#{id} or sftc_order_express.ship_user_id=#{id})
and sftc_order_express.state=#{state}
SELECT * FROM sftc_order o, sftc_order_express oe WHERE oe.uuid = #{uuid} AND o.id = oe.order_id
mapper.delete: DELETE sftc_order, sftc_order_express FROM sftc_order LEFT JOIN sftc_order_express ON sftc_order.id = sftc_order_express.order_id WHERE sftc_order_express.uuid = #{uuid}
